message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the money with me taking 60% and you taking 40%. This seems fair considering the effort and time we've put into this game. Let me know what you think!

I think a 55/45 split is more equitable. It acknowledges that we both have a role in this game and gives us both a good share of the reward. Let's work together and find a solution that benefits us both.

Bob, considering the inflation affecting my share, I think a 55/45 split in my favor is reasonable. This way, we both get a fair share while acknowledging the diminishing value of the money for me. What do you say?
